TNIXC

about meprojectswritingrandom

[projects]

You can find more of these on my [github]

simple

A component based static site generator written in rust. I wrote it to make this website.

[Tnixc/simple] rust/cli

Toki

A simple time tracking app for macOS, written with swiftUI. Reminds you to clock out, take breaks etc.

[Tnixc/Toki] swift[WIP]

ZCore

A basic assembly parser and cpu 'emulator' with 256 bytes of ram and instructions, 8 registers. Written in zig, very much WIP

[Tnixc/ZCore] zig[WIP]

lightscrape-rs

A cli that asynchronously downloads websites that host light novels from a given url, parses it, and compiles it into an epub. It's written in rust and I wrote it because I wanted to read webnovels offline

[Tnixc/lightscrape-rs] rust/cli

tnixc.space

This very website. There's been lots of editions since the first one. There's a blog post covering all of them here.

[Tnixc/website-v6] rust/cli

edo

A color theme based off of the foreground colors of tokyo-night and the background color of catppuccin macchiato. I made it because I found catppuccin macchiato too desaturated. It mainly consists of catppuccin themes that I used replacer on to replace the hex codes.

[Tnixc/edo] theme

replacer

A nice and simple cli that reads a toml file of pairs and recursively goes through every file, I wrote it for the purpose of generathing themes for tokyo.

[Tnixc/replacer] rust/cli

nix-config/dotfiles

My dotfiles for my macOS setup, with nix-darwin and home-manager. Pretty simple stuff.

[Tnixc/nix-config] nix
